alert.note: Alert for Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 21 at 11:31AM CDT until further notice by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected to continue through this afternoon. * WHERE...A portion of south central Nebraska, including the following county, Thayer. * WHEN...Until 330 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1128 AM CDT, concern remained for the potential of flooding along low-lying areas within portions of Thayer County. At 9:02 AM, emergency management reported heavy rain in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hebron, Carleton, Hubbell, Belvidere and Gilead. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
